<Custom Action End Effect>
$gameParty.aliveMembers().forEach(function(member) { 
member.gainHp(Math.floor((Math.random()/20 + 0.01)*member.mhp));
member.startDamagePopup();
member.clearResult(); 
})
</Custom Action End Effect>

} else if (target.isStateAffected(109)){

}
</Custom Remove Effect>

name: 回复一贫
我方全体护罩
note:
<Custom Respond Effect>
if($gameParty.inBattle()){ //only in battle
//otherwise bug using heal item in menu

if (value>0){
   if (this.isHpEffect()){
value = Math.floor(value/$gameParty.aliveMembers().length);

$gameParty.aliveMembers().forEach(function(member) { 
    //member.gainHp(value);
    //member.startDamagePopup();
    //member.clearResult();
    member.gainBarrier(value, 0)
  })
}
}
}
</Custom Respond Effect>

name: 沧兰回复共享
note:
<Custom Respond Effect>
if($gameParty.inBattle()){ //only in battle
//otherwise bug using heal item in menu

if (value>0 && this.isHpEffect()){
 if ($gameParty._battleMembers.contains(1)) {
  if ($gameActors.actor(1).isAlive() && $gameActors.actor(1).hp>0 && !$gameActors.actor(1).isRestricted()){
	if (target.hp>0) {
   var temp = Math.floor(Math.min(value, target.mhp)*(10+Math.min(($gameVariables.value(11)/15),30))/target.mhp);
   $gameActors.actor(1).gainTp(temp);
   //$gameActors.actor(1).startDamagePopup();
   $gameActors.actor(1).clearResult();
	}

  }
 }
}

}
</Custom Respond Effect>

name: 幽娘附加状态
note:
<Custom Establish Effect>
if($gameParty.inBattle()){ 
if (!target.isActor() && value>0) {
 var temp = Math.floor(Math.random()*73);
 if (temp < 11) {
 switch(temp) {
  case 0: target.addState(11); break;
  case 1: target.addState(6); break;
  case 2: target.addState(9); break;
  case 3: target.addState(8); break;
  case 4: target.addState(7); break;
  case 5: target.addState(10); break;
  case 6: target.addState(21); break;  
  case 7: target.addState(22); break; 
  case 8: target.addState(23); break;
  case 9: target.addState(24); break;  
  case 10: target.addState(25); break;    
 }
}
}
}
</Custom Establish Effect>

name: 投币式铠甲
note:
<Custom React Effect>
if($gameParty.inBattle()){ 
if (value>0 && $gameParty.gold()>0){
var temp = target.hp;
SoundManager.playShop();
 if (value<=$gameParty.gold()){
  $gameParty.loseGold(value);
  target.addState(110);
  target.gainHp(-value);
  target.startDamagePopup();
  target.setHp(temp);
  //target.gainHp(value);
  //target.startDamagePopup();
  target.removeState(110);
  value = 0;
 } else {
  $gameParty.loseGold($gameParty.gold());
  target.addState(110);
  target.gainHp(-$gameParty.gold());
  target.startDamagePopup();
  target.setHp(temp);
  //target.gainHp($gameParty.gold());
  //target.startDamagePopup();
  target.removeState(110);
  value -= $gameParty.gold();
 }
}
}
</Custom React Effect>

name: 反伤武系
note:
<Custom Respond Effect>
if (this.isHpEffect() && value>0){
var atk_elem = false;
var elements = this.getItemElements();
  for (var i = 0; i < elements.length; ++i) {
  //check if include specified element
        if (elements[i] == 1) {
		atk_elem = true;}
   }
   if (atk_elem) {
   a.startAnimation(2);
   a.gainHp(Math.floor(-0.8*value));
   a.startDamagePopup();
   a.clearResult();
  // BattleManager.actionWaitForAnimation();
   }
}
</Custom Respond Effect>

name: 我方全体吸血
note:
<Custom Respond Effect>
if($gameParty.inBattle()){ //only in battle
//otherwise bug using heal item in menu

if (value>0){
   if (this.isHpEffect()){
value = Math.floor(value/$gameParty.aliveMembers().length);

$gameParty.aliveMembers().forEach(function(member) { 
    member.gainHp(value);
    member.startDamagePopup();
    member.clearResult();

  })
}
}
}
</Custom Respond Effect>

name: 玄霄蓄力
note:
<Element Absorb: 2>
<loop animation: 399, visual, 999, battle>
<Custom Apply Effect>
//remove tag
target.removeState(186);
target.gainBarrier(Math.floor(0.5*target.mhp), 3);
</Custom Apply Effect>

// special damage with pal4 costume
<Custom React Effect>
   temp = 0;
if (value>0 && !this.isItem()){
   if (user.isStateAffected(104)||user.isStateAffected(105)||user.isStateAffected(106)||user.isStateAffected(107)){
	$gameParty.aliveMembers().forEach(function(member) { 
	if (member.isStateAffected(104)||member.isStateAffected(105)||member.isStateAffected(106)||member.isStateAffected(107)){
	temp += 0.5;}	
    })
   }
}
  temp = temp.clamp(0,2);
  value = Math.floor(value*(1+0.75*Math.pow(temp,2))).clamp(0,target.barrierPoints());
  value = value.clamp(0,Math.floor(0.15*target.mhp)); // limit max damage
</Custom React Effect>

// check barrier after turn ends
<Custom Remove Effect>
if (target.hp>0 && target.barrierPoints()>0){
// if barrier remains, do damage with event
  $gameVariables.setValue(65, Math.floor(0.2*target.barrierPoints()));
  target.addState(188);
    $gameSwitches.setValue(153, true);
} else {
// if barrier broken, add CD
target.addState(185);
}
</Custom Remove Effect>
// check barrier after damage execution
<Custom Deselect Effect>
if (target.barrierPoints()<=0){
target.removeState(183);
}
</Custom Deselect Effect>
<Custom Turn Start Effect>
if (target.barrierPoints()<=0){
target.removeState(183);
}
</Custom Turn Start Effect>

name: 夙瑶蓄力
note:
<loop animation: 400, visual, 999, battle>
<Element Absorb: 3>
<Custom Apply Effect>
//remove tag
target.removeState(186);
target.gainBarrier(Math.floor(0.6*target.mhp), 3);
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom React Effect>
   temp = 0;
if (value>0 && !this.isItem()){
   if (user.isStateAffected(104)||user.isStateAffected(105)||user.isStateAffected(106)||user.isStateAffected(107)){
	$gameParty.aliveMembers().forEach(function(member) { 
	if (member.isStateAffected(104)||member.isStateAffected(105)||member.isStateAffected(106)||member.isStateAffected(107)){
	temp += 0.5;}	
    })
   }
}
  temp = temp.clamp(0,2);
  value = Math.floor(value*(1+0.75*Math.pow(temp,2))).clamp(0,target.barrierPoints());
  value = value.clamp(0,Math.floor(0.15*target.mhp)); // limit max damage
</Custom React Effect>

// check barrier after turn ends
<Custom Remove Effect>
if (target.hp>0 && target.barrierPoints()>0){
// if barrier remains, open shield
	$gameVariables.setValue(66, Math.floor(0.5*target.barrierPoints()));
	target.addState(189);
} else {
// if barrier broken, add CD
target.addState(185);
}
</Custom Remove Effect>
// check barrier after damage execution
<Custom Deselect Effect>
if (target.barrierPoints()<=0){
target.removeState(184);
}
</Custom Deselect Effect>
<Custom Turn Start Effect>
if (target.barrierPoints()<=0){
target.removeState(184);
}
</Custom Turn Start Effect>
